There were no other sightings in Hawthorne on or around July 17th 2012
divs: Sighting Detailsi was reading some documents online i saw a big flash on my door and i was like who is flashing inside because i live in a back unit and is dark and typically that was a very strong white lights in the sky. i didn't get a chance to see the object it was to fast i tried to record but the flashes where to fast and very bright. well honestly i was just curious who was flashing so i step outside to see the source of light. and i stood outside for 10 minutes and i saw the second flash five minutes later. by the time i went to grab my camera no more flashes. i wait outside for 30 minutes and nothing. Two flashes of white light one around 10:50 pm and the other big flash was 5 minutes later. Also two 3 years ago i saw some thing that left me unspeakable i saw one unknown flying object traveling on top of my house is was shaped like triangle and it was transparent. they way i was able to see the plane because i saw 6 lights moving at the same speed and i was able to see the outline of the craft. i never report these because i was scared the gov would come and knock my door. so i only told my sister and one friend.
